thread.title: Real Madrid News: Cristiano Ronaldo slams teammate after Valencia loss | Metro News
thread.title_full: Real Madrid News: Cristiano Ronaldo slams teammate after Valencia loss | Metro News

author: Metro Sport Reporter For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Real Madrid News: Cristiano Ronaldo slams teammate after Valencia loss | Metro News

organizations.name: metro news metro sport reporter for metro.co.uk

text:
Metro Sport Reporter for Metro.co.uk Thursday 23 Feb 2017 3:53 pm Cristiano Ronaldo scored in Real Madrid’s 2-1 defeat against Valencia on Wednesday (Picture: Getty Images) 
Cristiano Ronaldo was caught on camera slamming one of his Real Madrid teammates following Wednesday’s surprise defeat at Valencia. Keep smiling! Mourinho of all people melts hearts with touching message to Ranieri 
The Liga pacesetters were widely expected to extend their lead over Barcelona at the top of the table against a Valencia side who have been languishing in the lower reaches of the Spanish top flight all season. 
Two goals from West Ham flop Simone Zaza, however, helped Los Che record an unlikely victory which breathed new life into the race for the title with Zinedine Zidane’s side now just a point ahead of Barcelona, albeit having played a game less. Cristiano Ronaldo scored Real Madrid’s only goal in Wednesday’s 2-1 defeat at Valencia (Picture: Getty Images) 
Ronaldo threatened to spark a comeback with a superb header just before half time, but the home side clung on for a narrow 2-1 win which left the Portuguese superstar fuming. 
After the match, Spanish channel Cuatro captured the 32-year-old complaining to one of his teammates ‘I scored a goal, what did you do?’ although it is unclear who the barb was aimed at.
